title: Ping Spikes!?! HELP
body: I have 3 other people playing league of legends right next to me, and I am the only one that gets frequent 1k ping spikes from 39 ping. They all do not get these spikes... I have done several virus scans and malware scans and have found nothing. Please help me before I break more things around me.

replies.body:
You may be experiencing some issues with your specific network adapter. I strongly recommend hitting up your network adapter manufacturer's support site to ensure you have a clean, fresh drive installed.

If this didn't cause a change, let me know.
